Description.Name: Pirates Ambush the Argo
Description.Details: Your daily routine is again interupted by the alarm klaxons going off throught the Argo As you rush onto the bridge, you denote the ominous presence of hostile ships on the viewscreen of the Argo, their approach carrying a vengeful tone. Darius sees you and relays their aggressive message to the bridge holodisplay, "Seems you just aren't learning your lessons, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. We're back again, and ready for another little skirmish. So, are you going pay us double this time or will you risk your Leopard again? Oh, and don't think your trick with your Leopard was as effective as you believe. Send it out again, and we will get in some parting shots before we leave." As the tension rises, Sumire remarks, "Commander, they're not looking to negotiate this time. Should I prepare the Leopard for a more intense response?"

Description.Name: Lose C-Bills & Morale
Description.Details:
Swallowing your pride, you approve the payment. The look of disappointment on Sumire's face echoes that of the rest of the bridge crew.

Adding insult to injury, the voice over the bridge's speaker drips with satisfaction. "Ah, I see you've come to your senses, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}.  Maybe next time, if you continue to be sensible, I'll give you <i>'Mates Rates'<i>, Hahahaha!"

As the pirate ships disappear into the starry distance, you turn to Darius, "Still no updates as to who they are?"

Darius looks up from his panel and shrugs, "Same as before Commander, Jamie Rayson and Mr Bubbles were a formidable team, and current rumors suggest that he will not stop until she is found."

Description.Name: Stall until the Leopard is ready.
The pirates flee
Description.Details: You stare at the pirate on the viewscreen, his visage obfuscated by an obvious cloaking filter, before answering, "LAUNCH!" The figure smiles, fully expecting you'd want to fight, "Let's dance, Commander!" The Leopard disengages gracefully from the Argo, unleashing a salvo of LRMs that streak through the void toward the marauding pirate ships. Agile as shadows, the bandit vessels elegantly sidestep the incoming missiles, retaliating with a fusillade aimed at both the Leopard and the Argo. A cosmic ballet unfolds, the interplay of lasers and missiles illuminating the darkness of space. A precise volley from the Leopard finds its mark, mercilessly crippling one of the bandit ships. The wounded vessel limps, its companions rallying around it in a defensive formation. In a strategic retreat, they veer away from the Argo, the enigmatic leader transmitting a final defiant message, "You won this round, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. Be seeing you soon." As the pirate ships disappear into the starry distance, you turn to Darius, "Still no updates as to who they are?" Darius looks up from his panel and shrugs, "Same as before Commander, Jamie Rayson and Mr Bubbles were a formidable team, and current rumors suggest that he will not stop until she is found."

Description.Name: The pirates flee but a MechWarrior is injured
Description.Details: You stare at the pirate on the viewscreen, his visage obfuscated by an obvious cloaking filter, before answering, "LAUNCH!" The figure smiles, "Let's dance, Commander!" The Leopard gracefully disengages from the Argo, unleashing a barrage of SRMs that streak through the cosmic expanse toward the marauding pirate ships. The agile bandit vessels elegantly dodge the incoming missiles while responding with a relentless onslaught, targeting both the Leopard and the Argo. The relentless clash unfolds – lasers and SRMs painting a vivid spectacle against the backdrop of space. Amidst the chaos, a well-aimed volley from the Leopard finds its mark, brutally incapacitating one of the bandit ships. However, the Argo doesn't emerge unscathed. The remaining assailants disengage. As they retreat, the mysterious leader transmits his parting message, "You've wounded us, as we have wounded you, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. Be seeing you soon..." Darius calls out, "Commander, we have sustained minor damage and reports of injured personel throughout the ship, including [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], who was caught in one of the blasts. {SCN_MW.Subj_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:have been|Default:has been} taken to MedBay." You acknowledge Darius' report as the pirate ships disappear into the starry distance, "Any more updates as to who they are?" Darius looks up from his panel and shrugs, "Same as before Commander, Jamie Rayson and Mr Bubbles were a formidable team, and current rumors suggest that he will not stop until she is found."
